com.mongodb

Interface DBConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBTCPConnector
    Deprecated. 
    This class is NOT part of the public API. It will be dropped in 3.x releases.

    @Deprecated
public interface DBConnector
    Interface that provides the ability to exchange request/response with the database

    • Method Detail

      • requestStart

        void requestStart()
        Deprecated. 
        initiates a "consistent request" on the thread. Once this has been called, the connector will ensure that the same underlying connection is always used for a given thread. This happens until requestStop() is called.

      • requestDone

        void requestDone()
        Deprecated. 
        terminates the "consistent request".

      • requestEnsureConnection

        void requestEnsureConnection()
        Deprecated. 
        Ensures that a connection exists for the "consistent request"

      • say

        WriteResult say(DB db,
              com.mongodb.OutMessage m,
              WriteConcern concern)
        Deprecated. 
        does a write operation
        Parameters:
        db - the database
        m - the request message
        concern - the write concern
        Returns:
        the write result
        Throws:
        MongoException

              com.mongodb.OutMessage m,
              WriteConcern concern,
              ServerAddress hostNeeded)
        Deprecated. 
        does a write operation
        Parameters:
        db - the database
        m - the request message
        concern - the write concern
        hostNeeded - specific server to connect to

                        DBCollection coll,
                        com.mongodb.OutMessage m,
                        ServerAddress hostNeeded,
                        int retries)
        Deprecated. 
        does a read operation on the database
        Parameters:
        db - the database
        coll - the collection
        m - the request message
        hostNeeded - specific server to connect to
        retries - the number of retries in case of an error
        Returns:
        the read result
        Throws:
        MongoException

      • call

        com.mongodb.Response call(DB db,
                        DBCollection coll,
                        com.mongodb.OutMessage m,
                        ServerAddress hostNeeded,
                        int retries,
                        ReadPreference readPref,
                        DBDecoder decoder)
        Deprecated. 
        does a read operation on the database
        Parameters:
        db - the database
        coll - the collection
        m - the request message
        hostNeeded - specific server to connect to
        retries - number of retries in case of error
        readPref - the read preferences
        decoder - the decoder to use
        Returns:
        the read result
        Throws:
        MongoException

        Deprecated.

      • authenticate

        CommandResult authenticate(MongoCredential credentials)
        Deprecated. 
        Authenticate using the given credentials.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials.
        Returns:
        the result of the authentication command, if successful
        Throws:
        CommandFailureException - if the authentication failed
        Since:
        2.11.0
